name: Gardener
description: They seem friendly, but they have a lot of dirt on their hands.

actionResponse.look: They seem friendly, but they have a lot of dirt on their hands.

name: Cadet
description: They seem young to be wearing a military uniform.

actionResponse.look: They seem young to be wearing a military uniform.

name: Head Chef
description: The Head Chef is wearing a white chef uniform and a big floppy hat.

actionResponse.look: The Head Chef is wearing a white chef uniform and a big floppy hat.

name: Shadowy Figure
description: The shadows prevent you from getting a clear look at their face.

actionResponse.look: The shadows prevent you from getting a clear look at their face.

name: Information Center Liaison
description: They look like they might have some useful information.

actionResponse.look: They look like they might have some useful information.

name: Random Alien
description: They don't seem very interested in you.

actionResponse.look: They don't seem very interested in you.

name: Spacewalker Felix
description: You don't see a pod anywhere, how did they get here?

actionResponse.look: You don't see a pod anywhere, how did they get here?

name: Desert Alien
description: They seem to be handling the heat just fine.

actionResponse.look: They seem to be handling the heat just fine.

name: Spacewalker Sam
description: Their spacesuit is definitely too long for them.

actionResponse.look: Their spacesuit is definitely too long for them.

name: Spacewalker Kun
description: They might be interested in trading.

actionResponse.look: They might be interested in trading.

name: Spacewalker Jasper
description: They're always hanging out in the floating garden.

actionResponse.look: They're always hanging out in the floating garden.
